threads: .⁦@AOC⁩ is it a “crime against humanity” when ⁦@POTUS⁩ secretly flies migrants into Westchester (the place you grew up)? The crime here is allowing the continued flow of illegal immigration, human trafficking and drugs. It has to stop!
text: lol ur missing the point as usual. crime against humanity is the system that creates conditions forcing ppl to flee their homes. but sure, let's focus on "illegal" migration instead of fixing the root probs. classic distraction tactics.   🚩✊
